00005 // We can't rely solely on NSAssert, because many developers disable them for release builds.
00006 // Our API contract requires us to keep these assertions intact.
00007 #define DDCheck(condition, desc, ...)  { if(!(condition)) { [[NSAssertionHandler currentHandler] handleFailureInMethod:_cmd object:self file:[NSString stringWithUTF8String:__FILE__] lineNumber:__LINE__ description:(desc), ##__VA_ARGS__]; } }
